sections.heading: Overview
sections.content: Raghubir Singh Junior Modern School believes that learning is not confined to classrooms or textbooks. It is a journey of discovery that nurtures intellectual curiosity, moral integrity, and creative thinking. The school’s academic framework is designed to balance conceptual understanding with experiential learning, ensuring holistic development of each child.

sections.heading: Curriculum Philosophy
sections.content: The RSJMS curriculum integrates knowledge, skills, and values across all disciplines. It encourages children to question, reason, and explore rather than merely memorize. Teachers adopt an interdisciplinary approach that blends art, science, and language learning through projects, discussions, and experiments. The curriculum promotes balance—between academics, sports, and creative pursuits—to develop well-rounded personalities.

sections.heading: Teaching Methodology
sections.content: Classroom learning is participatory and child-centric. Teachers use visual aids, digital resources, and hands-on materials to make abstract concepts tangible. Collaborative projects, storytelling, and interactive discussions are integral to the process. Each lesson is designed to cultivate critical thinking, self-expression, and a sense of curiosity about the world.

sections.heading: Assessment and Evaluation
sections.content: Assessment at RSJMS focuses on progress, not comparison. The school follows a continuous and comprehensive evaluation system that assesses both scholastic and co-scholastic domains. Observations, class participation, creative work, and project submissions contribute to the child’s overall assessment. Reports emphasize individual growth, effort, and consistency rather than competitive ranking.

sections.heading: Enrichment Programmes
sections.content: Enrichment activities are woven into the timetable to stimulate creativity and interest. Programmes such as Reading Week, STEM Day, Math Fun Fairs, and Heritage Week provide students with opportunities to connect theory to practice. Guest lectures, story sessions, and field explorations enhance conceptual understanding and real-world awareness.

sections.heading: Learning Support and Inclusion
sections.content: RSJMS maintains a structured Learning Centre where educators and counsellors collaborate to identify and support students with diverse learning needs. The school values inclusion and ensures that every child, regardless of learning style or pace, receives guidance and encouragement to reach their full potential.

sections.heading: Teacher Collaboration
sections.content: Regular faculty meetings, workshops, and reflective sessions ensure that teaching remains innovative and aligned with evolving educational standards. Teachers continually refine their practices through peer collaboration and training, embodying the school’s ethos of lifelong learning.
